name: The Sunflower Farmer
description:
The image, "The Sunflower Farmer" was created to reflect the hard-working farmers who grow and harvest golden fields of sunflowers despite the challenges of pests, plant diseases, inclement weather, and climate change. While enjoying golden bouquets of sunflowers or a snack of sunflower seeds, many people may not be aware of the cost, skill and determination required to ensure a good harvest. 

  The image was created by using a text prompt, algorithms, and artificial intelligence. The Snowpixel App was used in the process. The image will be interpreted differently through the eyes and imagination of the viewer.
